articles.title: Google, Justice Department make final arguments about whether search engine is a monopoly - The Associated Press
articles.description: The government and Google are making their closing arguments in a high-stakes antitrust trial to a federal judge in Washington who must now decide whether the tech giant’s search engine constitutes an illegal monopoly. The Justice Department argued Friday tha…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Googles preeminence as an internet search engine is an illegal monopoly propped up by more than $20 billion spent each year by the tech giant to lock out competition, Justice Departme… [+4278 chars]

articles.title: Why Apple Stock Jumped on Friday - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The tech giant's iPhone sales are declining.
articles.content: Apple(NASDAQ: AAPL) stock popped in early trading on Friday, helping lift the entire market higher as well. The tech giant accounts for an outsized portion of the broader earnings of the S&P 500,… [+2919 chars]

articles.title: Don't Miss: Eta Aquariid Meteor Shower, Red Giant Star Antares, and May Planets - SciTechDaily
articles.description: What are some skywatching highlights in May 2024? Mars and Saturn tussle with the Moon, Mercury makes a brief a.m. appearance, East Coasters can see red giant star Antares emerge from behind the Moon, and the eta Aquariid meteors peak on May 6th. https://yout…
articles.content: The Eta Aquariid Meteor Shower is an annual celestial event that occurs from late April to mid-May, peaking around May 5th and 6th. It results from Earth passing through the debris left by Comet Hall… [+5070 chars]
